data.message: Ithuriel, I think, pokes things with his spear to reveal truths. Maybe it's Uriel. If they are cute female rebels, he can poke them, and Mr. Mushu can shoo them into a holy bath (and poke them again). This angel...when I was little, used to follow me around...shoo, you humans is nasty, nasty, nasty. You need a bath. He meant that on more levels than one, but...LOL,

replies.message: There are seven layers v of heaven...and when he shooed me, I was at level 0. I was on earth.
I cannot even sit next to Uriel anywhere. Uriel just starts giggling...I start giggling..then Michael's knight comes over with this sword...

Apparently, no one likes Shadow hunters anyway. And God seems to only cadre about make dominance, and beautiful women (which I am not...beautiful that is). Joelle Verreet tried making me a fucking man in my teens. I was stabbed with male hormones at the library. She was looking for some transgender person named Adam (Adam in the transgender) and it wasn't me. I raised my hand, because I knew who Adam was, as she stabbed me. I wonder how I'd look without the involuntary changes. This one is not funny. I hate Joelle Verreet...Paddy Kelly's wife. The Kelly Family never fixed a dam thing. Changing someone's gender against their will is not ok.

I don't have the money to undo Joelles bull shit. The angels are magical enough to fix it...so is God, but they haven't. I do pray about it. I cannot afford hormones to undo what they did. I have hair growing in places I don't want it. In places I shouldn't need to shave. I'm female. Just because I get along with men doesn't mean I am a man. Just because I get male humor doesn't mean I'm a man. My own family treats me like a boy. They're rough emotionally, and sometimes physically. Yea...I wish they hadn't stunted my breast growth and made me grow unwanted hair with those hormones. I didn't want that. I'm female. To be honest, Raziel has the power to fix the changes to my DNA, but he hasn't. And it doesn't help that my father lies. I was a gorgeous FEMALE in the supernatural, but not on earth. I wish Raziel would undo the shit Joelle did, and Adam....and all of them. I don't like to go on dates, because of what they did to me...my father included. I wish they'd rot in jail. I'm not transsexual. I JOKE I have transgender days, because I like going to the gym, showering, them eating pizza in sweat pants, but I'M FEMALE. I like feeling pretty. I hate Joelle. I hate the Kelly Family. No one tries to make amends. I TRY TO.
